TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void Action<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4,in T5,in T6,in T7,in T8,in T9>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8, T9 arg9);
.class public auto ansi sealed Action`9<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4, - T5, - T6, - T7, - T8, - T9> extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Sub Action(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4, In T5, In T6, In T7, In T8, In T9)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4, arg5 As T5, arg6 As T6, arg7 As T7, arg8 As T8, arg9 As T9)

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7, typename T8, typename T9> public delegate void Action(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8, T9 arg9);

summary.span: 封装一个方法，该方法具有九个参数且不返回值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has nine parameters and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用委托作为参数传递方法，而不用显式声明自定义委托。You can use the delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封装的方法必须对应于此委托定义方法签名。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 这意味着，封装的方法必须具有九个参数是通过值传递给它，并且不能返回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have nine parameters that are all passed to it by value, and it must not return a value. (在 C# 中，该方法必须返回`void`。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必须由定义`Sub`...`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` 构造。construct. 它还可返回一个值，将被忽略的方法。）通常，这种方法用于执行操作。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation. > [!NOTE] > 若要引用的方法具有九个参数并返回一个值，使用泛型委托。To reference a method that has nine parameters and returns a value, use the generic delegate instead. 你还可以使用委托以及匿名方法和 lambda 表达式。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods and lambda expressions.
